p: Trunk bark: The essential oil isolated from Z. mezoneurispinosum trunk bark was rich in monoterpenes, including α-pinene (50.9%), sabinene (9.7%), linalool (5.1%), terpineol (4.2%), and β-myrcene (3.2%). β-caryophyllene (2.5%) and γ-eudesmol (5.2%) were the main sesquiterpenes found in this essential oil.
